name: Astaroth
title: The Soul Revenant
subtitle: An immortal warrior who feeds on the souls of the fallen
lore: A towering figure of darkness and might, Astaroth is an ancient warrior who draws power from the souls of those who fall in battle. His massive axe and unbreakable shield make him a formidable tank, while his ability to harvest souls allows him to sustain himself through the longest fights.

passive.name: Soul Revenant
passive.description: Astaroth generates souls around him whenever he takes damage [max 4] or when an enemy or ally dies nearby [max 8]. Each soul restores [4%/6%/7%/7%/8%] of maximum HP every [3s]. A soul lasts for [3s].

Q.name: Axe of Sorrow
Q.description: Astaroth swings his axe in the designated direction, slowing hit enemies by [45% MS] for [1.5s] and dealing [4%/5%/6%/7%/8% max HP] damage.

W.name: Groundbreaker
W.description: Astaroth smashes the ground, knocking up all nearby enemies for [0.75s] and dealing damage equal to [8% MAXHP].

E.name: Force of Wrath
E.description: Astaroth can grab a nearby knocked-up enemy and hold them for [0.3s], then throw them in the direction of the arrow, dealing [100/250/380/495/670/880] damage if they hit a wall.

R.name: Shield of Apathy
R.description: Astaroth's movement speed is slowed by [70%] but he takes [80%] less damage for [4s]. During this time, if an enemy damages him, Astaroth taunts them for the remaining duration.

1.name: Soul Collector
1.description: The maximum number of souls for damage is increased to [5].

1.name: Life Force
1.description: Item: Upon activation, Astaroth instantly restores [17%] of his HP and an additional [18%] over [15s]. [95s cd]

5.name: Double Flash
5.description: Astaroth gains a 2nd charge for the Flash summoner spell.

5.name: Unstoppable
5.description: Item: Upon activation, Astaroth cannot be slowed by enemies for [5s]. [45s cd]

5.name: Ground Mastery
5.description: The cooldown of the W ability is reduced by [2s].

10.name: Retribution Shield
10.description: While under the effect of Shield of Apathy, enemies that damage Astaroth take [1% max HP] damage to themselves when hitting him.

10.name: Mobile Defense
10.description: Astaroth does not have reduced movement speed during Shield of Apathy, but damage reduction is reduced to [50%].

15.name: Stunning Strike
15.description: Item: Upon activation, Astaroth's next basic attack stuns for [0.5s]. [20s cd]

15.name: Soul Surge
15.description: Item: Upon activation, Astaroth instantly gains [3] passive souls. [30s cd]

20.name: Enhanced Shield
20.description: The duration of Shield of Apathy is increased to [5s], and Astaroth's abilities recharge [50%] faster during its duration.
